description: This app is using light icons which makes them almost invisible in dark theme. I cannot find any option to change the icons.

After scanning my comics to create a library, it say driver not load (no idea what driver it need), no comics showing, and the rescan was grayout, try to remove and recreate the library to see it'll work, then it keep returning (the library was no longer available, do you want to remove it), it was removed x times. Beside that, if I just launch the reader by a comic zip file, it will not auto go to the next zip (all zip files was in the same folder), that's is a big - , lot of comic was go by chapters, if zip was supported it should have option go to next zip automatically, the go to next and previous folder was also grayout, if I can only view files in 1 Zip at a time, I can just use the default zip manager. look forward for improvement, thanks.

KDEneon Plasma ver. 5.27.4
Kernel Linux 5.19.0-40-gener
QT ver. 5.15.9
Really nice minimal application but with enough features to easily read comics. Best implementation of dark mode really sold it for me.
